page.title: 18GROSMONT GAMES 3
page.content: washing hands in.The hard way is across a fallen tree covered in ivy.The tree goes across the stream. When you have finished going up the tree you will find yourself in a tree house. {Pip says his favourite place to {play is:_ } "......in the wood near the castle, because I can make den's and climb trees.I have several of them and often go to them all.The sticks and logs came in handy for making them. You can also go down to the River Monnow but it is very slippery. {Two games children play are Robots {and Fox and Hounds. {Sam likes to play Robots. In the game Robots there is a robot called Roby.It's a bit like Armies,but we pretend that Aliens attack us.We have two dens to escape to.
